explains: vt. 使贬值；降低……的价值

sentences.en: They spread tales about her in an attempt to devalue her work.
sentences.cn: 他们散布关于她的传闻，企图贬低她的工作。

sentences.en: This way you devalue your opinion and show that you are incapable of managing your own life.
sentences.cn: 你贬低自己的观点，表明你无法管理自己的生活。

sentences.en: Let's not devalue her work unjustly.
sentences.cn: 我们不要不公正地贬低她的工作。
